title: Sage Instant Account V12
description:
Sage Instant Accounts is a single-user program that can be installed to suit your business, and lets you manage your finances, accounting functions, and customers and suppliers. SageInstant Accounts gives you an immediate snapshot of your financial position, with charts to illustrate where your money comes from and gs to. Your product, customer and supplier records can also be reported on, to find out, for example, who owes you money. In addition, Sage Instant Accounts integrates with Microsoft Excel, Word and Outlook, for further reporting or manipulation of data.

Sage Instant Accounts is the easy-to-use bookkeeping solution designed specifically for small and start-up businesses. It enables you to do your accounts in hours instead of days. A totally integrated system that records all your financial transactions, Sage Instant Accounts automatically updates your ledgers and holds customer, supplier and product information. It will also print your invoices and produce financial reports.

Features
Sage Instant Account V12  
A copy of Internet Explorer v6 or higher (this is included on the CD)  
Users of networked versions should use one of the following networks: Microsoft Windows Networking ? Novell Netware v5.0 ? Novell Netware v6.0  
Store all the information you need to track what you are buying, from whom, and how much it is costing you  
Store all the information you need to track what customers are buying, when, and how much they owe you  
Run Profit and Loss and Balance Sheet Reports at the touch of a button  
Prepare your VAT Return in minutes  
The Accountant Link allows you to share information securely with your accountant via an electronic link  
Integration with Microsoft Office  
Integration with Instant Payroll, Instant Forecasting and ACT! enables you to create a complete business management system  
NO!! Technical support is included 

100% FULLY WORKING SAGE

Upped By DJR829 / TPB,please leave your comments
